desc: RJ's Boat Lifts sells and services boat hoists, boat lifts, jet ski lifts, ShoreStations and accessories. We also carry free-standing docks and floating dock systems.

layout.text: Free-standing ShoreStation lifts, boathouse lifts, jet ski lifts, strap kits, cradle kits, EZ Docks, EZ Ports, canopies and more!
